modName: Dux Artorius - Imperial Warrior Companion V1
descriptionHtml:
Dux Artorius - Follower Imperial Knight by Sandraniks
----------------------
I made this mod for myself but I`d like to share with you...here you are)))
This mod adds the companion named Dux Artorius.
He is Imperial and he is a warrior.
Essential
Marriable
2-handed Weapon
Restoration Spells (Healing and HealingHands)
Illusion Spells (Fury, Calm, Hysteria etc)
Light&Heavy Armor Perks
He is Auto-Levelled NPC
Meet Artorius in Riften in Helga`s Bunkhouse

2.07.2012 - Version 2 added (no tattoos)





--------------------
Installation
--------------------
Just drop all content from archive downloaded to your Skyrim Daya folder.
Activate Artorius.esp and play



-------------------
How to uninstall
-------------------
Just delete the esp.file from the Data folder



-------------------
Bugs
-------------------
Not detected so far




Feel free to reuse or reupload this file just give credits if you like it

Have fun!
author: Sandraniks
